meanings.definition: Denims: a sturdy cotton twill fabric, typically blue, used for jeans.
meanings.sent1: She wore her favorite denims to the rodeo.
meanings.sent2: He bought a new pair of denims for the weekend.
meanings.sent3: The denims decided to take a walk in the park.
meanings.sent4: Her denims were a shield against the chilly wind.
meanings.sent5: The denims whispered tales of adventure and comfort.

meanings.definition: Denims: a pair of jeans made from denim fabric.
meanings.sent1: His denims were faded from many washes.
meanings.sent2: She loved the fit of her favorite denims.
meanings.sent3: The denims giggled as they hung in the closet.
meanings.sent4: His denims were a second skin, worn with pride.
meanings.sent5: The denims held memories of laughter and fun times.
